props.name: dsQa
props.doc: Quaity Assurance. Set for unique targeting during testing

props.name: dsForm
props.doc: The form HTML elment id the DsSelect select element belongs to

props.name: dsLabel
props.doc: Label text displayed over the Select

props.name: dsDefaultOptionId
props.doc: Default selected option id. Provide as id of option you want to be selected by default

props.name: dsPlaceholder
props.doc: Placeholder. Displayed only if no dsDefaultValue provided

props.name: dsOnChange
props.doc: Event callback on user selecting an option

props.name: dsClass
props.doc: Support for adding Classes to element

props.name: disabled
props.doc: Native properties from HTML5, React etc. are not prefixed

props.name: id
props.doc: Support for adding ID attribute to element
